body: Don't allocate the memory trusting the values in a toxsave file. Fixes #2083 Found with https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/runs/5266641816?check_suite_focus=true#step:5:479 --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/2084)

comment_data.body: Memory leak: realloc doesn't free on failure.
This is handled in the cleanup code in line 3572
`g->frozen` will be `nullptr` and `free` will be a no-op. Where do you keep track of the old pointer that was passed to `realloc`?
I see, should be fixed now.

commit.message:
fix: out-of-memory condition by corrupted save file

Don't allocate the memory trusting the values in a toxsave file.
